bike.description: Specialized E5 aluminum, fully manipulated tubing, smooth weld, semi-compact race design, shaped TT, 1.5" lower bearing, internal cable routing, integrated headset, OSBB

components.description: S-Works FACT carbon legs, alloy crown and steerer, 1.5" lower bearing
1 1/8 upper and 1 1/5" lower Cr-Mo cartridge bearings integrated w/ headset, 8mm cone spacer with 20mm of spacers
Specialized Comp-Set, 3D forged alloy, 4-position adjustable, 4-bolt 31.8mm clamp
Specialized CX Comp 6061 alloy, short drop
Black cage, body & toe clips w/ strap
Roval Pavé, aluminum, anti-pinch rim edge, sleeve joint, w/ stainless steel eyelets
Roval Pavé, 20h, cold forged aluminum five-spoke high flange, adjustable aluminum axle, Roval QR
Roval Pavé, 24h, cold forged aluminum five-spoke high flange, adjustable aluminum axle, Roval QR
Specialized Captain CX Sport, 700x34c, wire bead, 60TPI
Specialized Captain CX Sport, 700x34c, wire bead, 60TPI
Body Geometry Riva Road, w/ steel rails
Specialized Comp, FACT carbon w/ Zertz insert, aluminum head, two-bolt clamp, 27.2mm
Chain stay protector, chain catcher, derailleur hanger, clear coat, owners manual
